The Merthyr telegraph, and general advertiser for the iron districts of South Wales - 1876-04-28
Began with issue for: 11 Aug. 1855. Ended with issue for: 24 June 1881.
Description based on issue for: 11 Aug. 1855.
Cyhoeddwyd ac argraffwyd ym Merthyr Tudful gan Peter Williams.
Published and printed in Merthyr Tydfil by Peter Williams.
Papur newydd wythnosol a oedd yn cylchredeg yn ardaloedd cynhyrchu haearn De Cymru. Cyhoeddwyd y papur newydd rhwng 1855 a 1881 a'i brif gynnwys oedd newyddion a gwybodaeth leol.
A weekly newspaper circulating in the iron producing areas of South Wales. Published between 1855 and 1881, the newspaper's main content was local news and information.

A Critical Examination of the First Principles of Geology: In a series of essays.
A study of the basic principles of geology, including the properties of rocks and their order of succession.
